name: Metalfoes Goldriver
desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ] 
Once per turn: You can target 1 other face-up card you control; destroy it, and if you do, Set 1 "Metalfoes" Spell/Trap directly from your Deck.
[ Monster Effect ] 
''That gleaming, golden buggy breaks bad guys good. What wonderful wheels! (With a bumbling buffoon....)''
pend_desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 other face-up card you control; destroy it, and if you do, Set 1 "Metalfoes" Spell/Trap directly from your Deck.
